detail_desc: Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit for a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Triangular cups with removable inserts and wide straps that tie at the back of the neck. Lined gusset.
Fully lined shaping swimsuit for a sculpting effect on the tummy, back and seat. Triangular cups with removable inserts and wide straps that tie at the back of the neck. Lined gusset.

Top in light sweatshirt fabric with short puff sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and an elasticated hem.

T-shirt in printed cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.

Cardigan in a soft, fine cotton knit with sequined appliqués and buttons down the front.
Fitted V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a wrapover front and short sleeves.
Fitted V-neck top in ribbed jersey with a wrapover front and short sleeves.
Short dungaree dress in washed denim with adjustable straps with a metal fastener at the front. Chest pocket, front and back pockets, buttons at the sides, fake fly and raw-edge, frayed hems.
5-pocket shorts in sturdy washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in sturdy washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Oxford cotton shirt in a straight, relaxed style with a grandad collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem.
Striped scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 55x160 cm.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a high waist for a good fit over the tummy. Wide elastication at the waist and jacquard-patterned details. Seamless.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing at the waist for a comfortable fit.

Loose-fitting blouse in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Sports top in soft, fast-drying, functional fabric with short cap sleeves and a longer inner top with a racer back. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.

Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.

Boots in imitation leather with an appliqué on the tongue, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a decorative welt seam in a contrasting colour around the soles. Canvas linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Ankle-length leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist.
Boots in mesh and rubber. Lacing with speed hooks at the top, and a loop with a reflective detail at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with short sleeves, a concealed zip down the back and a seam at the waist with a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top, short sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Short dress in sturdy cotton jersey with an embroidered motif at the top, short sleeves, a seam at the waist and flared skirt.

Imitation leather boots with a zip in the side, lacing and a lightly padded tongue with an embossed motif at the top. One tab with a buckle and button stud on the front and another on the shaft. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with print motifs and embroidery, concealed press-studs on one shoulder and short slits in the sides.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Wide blouse in a striped weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and long, wide sleeves with a wide lace trim at the cuffs. Longer at the back.

Trousers in stretch cotton twill with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist, zip fly and a concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, a slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with sewn-in creases.

Shorts in a cotton weave with a zip fly and button, adjustable tab and buttons at the sides, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a button. Relaxed fit with a slightly lower crotch and short legs.

Coat in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, concealed buttons down the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Shoulder tabs and decorative gathers at the shoulder seam, a tie belt at the waist and ties at the cuffs. Unlined.

Jacket in sturdy cotton twill with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a collar with a tab and button. Flap patch front pockets with a concealed press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and concealed press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.

Jacket in sturdy cotton twill with a zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front and a collar with a tab and button. Flap patch front pockets with a concealed press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and concealed press-studs at the cuffs. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap patch pockets with press-studs, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Jacket in woven fabric with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Flap patch pockets with press-studs, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Lace cardigan with 3/4-length dolman sleeves, a rounded hem and no buttons.
Lace cardigan with 3/4-length dolman sleeves, a rounded hem and no buttons.

Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with a text print and embroidered appliqué. Jersey-lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, raw-edge hems.
Oversized, long-sleeved top in marled sweatshirt fabric with an embroidered appliqué, dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jumper in jacquard-knit cotton with hard-worn details. Reverse-stitched seams on the shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in an airy, spot-print viscose weave with a concealed zip at the back of the neck and shoulder pads. Long sleeves with ties at the cuffs and a frilled drawstring at the front. Unlined.
Wide, cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the back and ribbing around the neckline. Relaxed fit.
